howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, three-step process to get you started on your journey to smarter farming.

step1.title: Upload an Image
step1.description: Take a photo of your crop. Our AI analyzes it against a vast database of plant diseases and pests.

step2.title: Get Instant Diagnosis
step2.description: Receive an immediate, accurate diagnosis and learn about the potential impact on your crops.

step3.title: Receive Actionable Advice
step3.description: Get tailored, sustainable treatment plans and preventative measures to protect your harvest.

stopGuessing.title: Stop Guessing, Start Growing
stopGuessing.description: Our platform transforms your farming practices from reactive to proactive. Make data-driven decisions that save money, improve crop health, and increase your bottom line.
stopGuessing.p1_desc: Apply the right treatment at the right time, minimizing waste and maximizing effectiveness.
stopGuessing.p2_desc: Early detection and optimized recommendations lead to healthier crops and better harvests.
stopGuessing.imageAlt: A farmer examining a healthy plant leaf with a smartphone.

features.title: Smarter Farming, Simplified
features.subtitle: Our suite of AI-powered tools is designed to be intuitive and impactful, giving you an expert agronomist in your pocket.

diagnostics.title: AI-Powered Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Snap a photo of a sick plant and get an instant diagnosis of potential diseases, pests, or nutrient deficiencies.

insights.title: Data-Driven Insights
insights.description: Track your farm's performance over time, analyze trends, and unlock insights to improve your operations season after season.

recommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
recommendations.description: Receive personalized, sustainable treatment and prevention plans tailored to your specific crop and diagnosis.

assistant.title: 24/7 AI Assistant
assistant.description: Ask questions about farming techniques, market prices, or sustainable practices and get instant, expert-level answers.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Farmers and Partners Worldwide

t1.quote: DamDoh's AI diagnostics saved our tomato crop from late blight. We got an accurate diagnosis in minutes and the recommended organic treatment worked wonders. It's a game-changer for smallholder farmers like us.

t2.quote: As an exporter, traceability is non-negotiable. DamDoh provides a seamless, verifiable log for our coffee shipments, giving our international buyers the confidence they need. It has opened up new premium markets for our partner co-ops.
t2.name: Carlos Gomez

t3.quote: The platform's ability to connect us with verified farmer cooperatives has streamlined our sourcing process. We've reduced our risk and improved the quality of our supply chain significantly.
t3.name: Priya Sharma

hero.title: Connecting the Global Agri-Food Value Chain
hero.subtitle: Our vision is a fully transparent, efficient, and equitable agricultural ecosystem, powered by technology and community.

vision.title: Our Vision & Mission
vision.p1: The global food system is fragmented, inefficient, and often inequitable. Smallholder farmers, who produce a significant portion of the world's food, frequently lack access to markets, financing, and critical information, leading to post-harvest losses and limited income.
vision.p2: DamDoh was founded to bridge these gaps. We are building a single, unified digital platform that connects every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain—from farmers and cooperatives to logistics providers, financial institutions, global buyers. Our mission is to empower these communities with the tools and data they need to thrive, creating a more sustainable and prosperous future for all.

challenge.title: The Challenge We're Solving
challenge.description: The agricultural supply chain is plagued by systemic challenges that hinder growth and sustainability. We are tackling these issues head-on:

marketAccess.title: Limited Market Access
marketAccess.details: Farmers struggle to connect directly with buyers, leading to reliance on intermediaries and reduced profits.

inefficiency.title: Supply Chain Inefficiency
inefficiency.details: Poor logistics, lack of coordination, and manual processes result in significant delays and spoilage.

financialExclusion.title: Financial Exclusion
financialExclusion.details: Lack of verifiable data makes it difficult for farmers to access loans, insurance, and other financial products.

informationGaps.title: Information Gaps
informationGaps.details: Access to timely advice on best practices, pest control, and market prices is often limited.

qualityTrust.title: Lack of Quality & Trust
qualityTrust.details: Buyers cannot easily verify the origin, quality, or sustainable practices of agricultural products.

climatePressure.title: Climate Pressure
climatePressure.details: Changing weather patterns and environmental degradation pose increasing threats to crop yields.

foodLoss.title: Post-Harvest Food Loss
foodLoss.details: A significant percentage of produce is lost between the farm and the consumer due to poor handling and storage.

dataFragmentation.title: Data Fragmentation
dataFragmentation.details: Valuable data is siloed across different organizations, preventing a holistic view of the supply chain.

solution.title: The DamDoh Solution
solution.description: We've built an integrated 'super app' that acts as the digital backbone for the entire agricultural ecosystem.

list.education: A knowledge hub for sustainable practices like KNF and FGW, backed by an AI assistant.
list.ai: AI-powered crop diagnostics and data-driven insights for smarter farming decisions.
list.marketplace: A global marketplace to connect farmers directly with buyers and service providers.
list.logistics: Tools for farm management, traceability (VTI), and optimizing logistics.
list.financial: A platform for financial inclusion, enabling access to credit, insurance, and new markets.

p2p.title: Peer-to-Peer
p2p.content: Farmers can share knowledge and best practices in community forums and groups.

p2b.title: Producer-to-Business
p2b.content: Directly connecting farmers and cooperatives with buyers, processors, and exporters.

p2e.title: Producer-to-Ecosystem
p2e.content: Providing financial institutions, insurers, and regulators with the data they need to support the agricultural sector.

p2w.title: Producer-to-World
p2w.content: Using traceability to give consumers worldwide confidence in the products they buy.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.p1: We believe in the power of technology to create positive change.
commitment.p2: We are committed to building a platform that is inclusive, transparent, and beneficial for every participant.
commitment.p3: Join us in revolutionizing the global food system.

careers.title: Careers at DamDoh
careers.subtitle: Join our mission to reshape the future of agriculture.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: We are a passionate, globally-minded team dedicated to solving some of the world's most pressing challenges in food security and sustainability. At DamDoh, you will:
whyWorkWithUs.point1: Work on a product with a tangible, positive impact on communities worldwide.
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Collaborate with a diverse and talented team of engineers, designers, and agricultural experts.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: Tackle complex technical challenges at the intersection of AI, blockchain, and supply chain logistics.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: Enjoy a flexible, remote-friendly work environment.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: Grow your skills and career in a fast-paced, mission-driven startup.

noOpenings.title: No Openings at this Time
noOpenings.content1: We are always looking for passionate and talented individuals to join our team. If you believe you would be a great fit, please send your resume and cover letter to {emailLink}.

job1.title: Senior Backend Engineer (Node.js, Firebase)
job1.description: Design and build scalable backend services using Firebase Functions, Firestore, and Node.js. Experience with microservices architecture and real-time data is a plus.

job2.title: Lead Frontend Engineer (Next.js, React)
job2.description: Lead the development of our user-facing applications using Next.js and React. Strong experience with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and building complex, data-driven interfaces is required.

job3.title: AI/ML Engineer (Genkit, TensorFlow)
job3.description: Develop and deploy machine learning models for crop diagnostics, market analysis, and personalized recommendations. Experience with Google AI Platform and Genkit is highly desirable.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Our principles for a healthy, collaborative, and professional ecosystem.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to the DamDoh community! To ensure our platform remains a positive and productive space for all stakeholders, we ask that you adhere to the following guidelines in all your interactions, whether in forums, messaging, or marketplace listings.

respectful.title: Be Respectful and Constructive
respectful.description: Treat all members with respect, even when you disagree. Focus on constructive criticism and collaborative problem-solving. Harassment, hate speech, and personal attacks will not be tolerated.

authentic.title: Be Authentic and Honest
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your business truthfully. Do not misrepresent your products, services, certifications, or identity. Building trust is the cornerstone of our community.

relevant.title: Stay On-Topic and Add Value
relevant.description: Contribute to discussions in a way that is relevant and adds value to the conversation. Avoid spam, unsolicited advertising, and off-topic content in professional forums and marketplace discussions.

fairTrade.title: Uphold Fair Trade Practices
fairTrade.description: Engage in all transactions and negotiations with fairness and integrity. Do not engage in price-gouging, deceptive marketing, or failure to deliver on agreed-upon terms.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainable Practices
sustainable.description: Our community is dedicated to a more sustainable future. We encourage the sharing of knowledge about regenerative and sustainable agriculture, and we value members who prioritize these practices.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you see content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it to our team at {emailLink}. We are committed to enforcing these rules to protect our community.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: Thank you for helping us build a trusted and collaborative global agricultural community.

privacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy notice for DamDoh describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share ('process') your information when you use our services.

willInfoBeShared.content: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations.

cookiesAndTracking.content: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to access or store information.

updatesToNotice.heading: 10. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
